p: No statistically significant differences were found in FASN gene expression between HFD and NFD, but GbE supplementation significantly decreased it by 70.7% in relation to NFD ( Figure 6B, p = 0.03). The FASN gene expression experiment was followed by tissue FAS protein quantification by western blotting. We have confirmed that there were no differences in FAS protein between NFD and HFD, but GbE supplementation did reduce tissue FAS content by 38% ( p = 0.05) in relation to NFD ( Figure 7A). No statistically significant differences were found in p-HSL and HSL protein amongst the three groups ( Figures 7Bâ€“D).
